20.01.15.name: wordpress/wp-admin-bar-node-removal
20.01.15.description:
completely remove admin bar node, group, link, on frontend and backend, for third party (free only) plugins on wp 3.1+ 3.2+ (only)

This plugin is Add-On for WP Admin Bar Removal. Completely Remove Admin Bar Node, Frontend, Backend, Free Memory, Speedup Dasboard, on WordPress 3.1+ 3.2+ 3.3+ (only), for Third Party (free) Plugins.

Work under GPLv2 or later License. Implement GNU style coding standard indentation.

No need to delete anything from hosting space when deactivate!
No need to delete anything from hosting space when deleted!
No need to delete anything from the database when deactivate!
No need to delete anything from the database when deleted!
No need to delete anything from the wp_option when deactivate!
No need to delete anything from the wp_option when deleted!
